title: >>> BENNY and JENNY Ain't Got Nothing on Us!
body_text:
A "secret" yet to be revealed, a long-awaited, eagerly anticipated announcement, and two reckless warriors collide once more. Talk about a mighty fine looking line-up, this is it right here!
DODGEBALL 108
Secret Selection
Votes have been tallied thus far and may "the writer" say things are looking rather interesting for the forthcoming 108th extravaganza.
Players have the opportunity to choose from one of three gametypes they'd wish to partake in at the October 20th bash: the
Four Team Tournament
, the likes of which have not been seen in nearly a year; the chaotic, unorthodox
BoxBall Dodgeball
, created by the legendary Chris Adams; and of course the traditional yet always intensly fun
Classic Two Team Match-Up
.
Again, those individuals who have yet to cast their vote may do so this weekend. But best be sure to attend DODGEBALL 106 because this will be the final time!
BIG TIME 110
We've seen 'em all ... except this one.
Those who have patiently waited to hear the mega main event for the season finale spectacular
DODGEBALL CX
on the 3rd of November will be finally be able to breathe once DODGEBALL 106 is all said and done! Make sure your ears are unplugged immediately following the conclusion of Game 2 for this shocking revelation!
AVAKIAN, LONDONO, Round 2
Who in the blue hell would have guessed the reemergence of the dreaded
Hit the Human
pregame contest could and would have created this much anarchy!?
The reckless daredevils meet yet again when suicidal dodger
Rob Avakian
goes toe to toe with the comedic "Cockroach" himself,
Juan Londono
.
Their first encounter was nothing short of spectacular with a climactical ending only seen in movies or envisioned in the most wild of dreams.
There isn't any doubt this return battle will live up the hype.
body_html:
A "secret" yet to be revealed, a long-awaited, eagerly anticipated announcement, and two reckless warriors collide once more. Talk about a mighty fine looking line-up, this is it right here!

DODGEBALL 108 Secret Selection
Votes have been tallied thus far and may "the writer" say things are looking rather interesting for the forthcoming 108th extravaganza.

Players have the opportunity to choose from one of three gametypes they'd wish to partake in at the October 20th bash: the Four Team Tournament, the likes of which have not been seen in nearly a year; the chaotic, unorthodox BoxBall Dodgeball, created by the legendary Chris Adams; and of course the traditional yet always intensly fun Classic Two Team Match-Up.

Again, those individuals who have yet to cast their vote may do so this weekend. But best be sure to attend DODGEBALL 106 because this will be the final time!

BIG TIME 110
We've seen 'em all ... except this one.

Those who have patiently waited to hear the mega main event for the season finale spectacular DODGEBALL CX on the 3rd of November will be finally be able to breathe once DODGEBALL 106 is all said and done! Make sure your ears are unplugged immediately following the conclusion of Game 2 for this shocking revelation!

AVAKIAN, LONDONO, Round 2
Who in the blue hell would have guessed the reemergence of the dreaded Hit the Human pregame contest could and would have created this much anarchy!?

The reckless daredevils meet yet again when suicidal dodger Rob Avakian goes toe to toe with the comedic "Cockroach" himself, Juan Londono. Their first encounter was nothing short of spectacular with a climactical ending only seen in movies or envisioned in the most wild of dreams. There isn't any doubt this return battle will live up the hype.
